meanings.sent1: She always prearranges her schedule for the week on Sunday evenings.
meanings.sent2: The event planner prearranges all the details before the big day.
meanings.sent3: He prearranges his outfit for the next day to save time in the morning.
meanings.sent4: The teacher prearranges the seating chart to avoid any disruptions.
meanings.sent5: The chef prearranges the ingredients to ensure a smooth cooking process.

meanings.sent1: They prearrange their travel plans to avoid any last-minute stress.
meanings.sent2: The team prearranges meetings to discuss project updates.
meanings.sent3: She prearranges a surprise party for her best friend's birthday.
meanings.sent4: The company prearranges the delivery of supplies to the warehouse.
meanings.sent5: He prearranges a study group session to prepare for the exam.
